items.title: Vodafone Idea’s Shares Decline After Supreme Court Defers AGR Hearing Again
items.description: The next hearing is scheduled for October 27. Analyst said the stock remains speculative and is likely to trade sideways near key moving averages.

items.title: TMQ, CRML, USAR: Lithium, Rare Earth Stocks Rally Premarket As US-China Trade Dispute Heats Up
